00020 #include <rdkcore/network/udpsocket.h>
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include <iomanip>
00023 #include <cstring>
00024 #include <cstdlib>
00025 #include <set>
00026 
00027 #define VERSION     1.1
00028 #define BUFFERSIZE  0xFFFF
00029 
00030 #define _DEBUG
00031 #ifdef _DEBUG
00032     #define DOUT(a) cout<<setw(4)<<__LINE__<<"|"<<setw(15)<<__func__<<"| "<<a<<endl;
00033 #else
00034     #define DOUT(a)
00035 #endif
00036 
00037 using namespace std;
00038 
00039 int main ( int argc, char** argv ) {
00040     try {
00041         set<unsigned short> group;
00042         if ( argc < 3 ) {
00043             cout<<"relay port forward1 forward2 forward3 ...\n";
00044             return 0;
00045         }
00046         
00047         // Server port
00048         int port = -1;
00049         port = atoi( argv[1] ); 
00050         if ( !( port > 0x400 && port < 0xFFFF) ) {
00051             cout<<"All port must be over 1024 and under 65000\n";
00052             return 0;
00053         }
00054         
00055         // Forward ports
00056         for ( int i = 2; i < argc; i++ ) {
00057             int temp = -1;
00058             temp = atoi( argv[i] );
00059             if ( !( temp > 0x400 && temp < 0xFFFF) )
00060                 cout<<"warning: All port must be over 1024 and under 65535 ( port "<<temp<<" ignored )\n";
00061             else if ( temp == port )
00062                 cout<<"warning: Cannot use same port for forward & recive ( port "<<temp<<" ignored )\n";
00063             else
00064                 group.insert( temp );
00065         }
00066         
00067         // Out a riepilogue
00068         cout<<"Incoming port = "<<port<<endl;
00069         for ( set<unsigned short>::const_iterator iter = group.begin(); iter != group.end(); iter++ ) {
00070             cout<<"Forward port  = "<<*iter<<endl;
00071         }
00072         
00073         Network::UDPSocket udpsocket( port );
00074         
00075         string str;
00076         Network::InetAddress sender;
00077         Network::InetAddress dest( "127.0.0.1", port );;
00078         
00079         DOUT("Waiting");
00080         
00081         while ( true ) {
00082             udpsocket.recv( str, sender );
00083             
00084             DOUT("Message received from " << sender.getIPAddress() << ":" << sender.getPort());
00085             
00086             for ( set<unsigned short>::const_iterator iter = group.begin(); iter != group.end(); iter++ ) {
00087                 dest.setPort( *iter );
00088                 udpsocket.send( str, dest );
00089                 DOUT("Message sent to "<<dest.getPort());
00090             }
00091         }
00092     
00093         return 1;
00094     } catch ( Network::NetException& netexc ) {
00095         cout<<"An error as occurred: "<<netexc.fullwhat()<<endl;
00096     }
00097     return 0;
00098 }

00101 #include <rdkcore/network/udpsocket.h>
00102 #include <iostream>
00103 #include <string.h>
00104 #include <set>
00105 
00106 #define VERSION     0.1
00107 
00108 using namespace std;
00109 using namespace Network;
00110 
00111 static bool help( int argc, const char** argv ) {
00112     for ( int i = 0; i < argc; i++ ) {
00113         if (    strcmp ( argv[i], "--help") == 0 ||
00114             strcmp ( argv[i], "-h" ) == 0 ) {
00115             // Print use information
00116             cout<<"UDP Relay - version "<<VERSION<<endl;
00117             cout<<"This program is part of SPQR-RDK\n\n";
00118             cout<<"To use:relay port\n\nes1: relay 5000 will open a receiving port on 5000 and a control port on 5001\n";
00119             cout<<"es2: relay 5000 6000 will open a receiving port on 5000 and a control port on 6000\n";
00120             cout<<"es3: relay 5000 5001 1500 will open a receiving port on 5000, with a buffer size of 1500 bytes\n\n";
00121             cout<<"A message 'register' from an udp port to the control port register that port for forwarding\n";
00122             cout<<"A second message 'bye' from the same udp port unregister that port\n";
00123         return true;
00124         }
00125     }
00126     return false;
00127 }
00128 
00129 class Forwarder {
00130     public:
00131         Forwarder( unsigned short forward, unsigned short control, unsigned short buffersize ) throw( NetException ) :
00132             forward( forward, buffersize ),
00133             control( control, 8 ) {
00134             pthread_mutex_init(&registered_mutex, 0);
00135         }
00136         
00137         ~Forwarder() {
00138             pthread_mutex_destroy(&registered_mutex);
00139         }
00140         
00141         void start() throw( NetException ) {
00142             // Launch forwarding thread
00143             pthread_create( &receiver_thread, NULL, receiver, this );
00144             string str;
00145             InetAddress addr;
00146             
00147             // Control command read cicle
00148             while ( true ) {
00149                 // Get a message
00150                 control.recv( str, addr );
00151                 // If is a registraition message;
00152                 if ( str == "register" ) {
00153                     pthread_mutex_lock(&registered_mutex);
00154                         registered.insert( addr.getPort() );
00155                     pthread_mutex_unlock(&registered_mutex);
00156                     cout<<"port: "<<addr.getPort()<<" registered ( ip: "<<addr.getIPAddress()<<" )\n";
00157                 } else if ( str == "bye" ) {
00158                     pthread_mutex_lock(&registered_mutex);
00159                         registered.erase( addr.getPort() );
00160                     pthread_mutex_unlock(&registered_mutex);
00161                     cout<<"port: "<<addr.getPort()<<" removed ( ip: "<<addr.getIPAddress()<<" )\n";
00162                 }
00163             }
00164         }
00165         
00166     private:
00167         UDPSocket forward;
00168         UDPSocket control;
00169         set<unsigned short> registered;
00170         pthread_t receiver_thread;
00171         pthread_mutex_t registered_mutex;
00172         
00173         static void* receiver( void* _this ) { 
00174             Forwarder* me = (Forwarder*)_this;
00175             string str;
00176             InetAddress addr;
00177             InetAddress dest( "127.0.0.1", 1234 );
00178             while ( true ) {
00179                 // Receive a packet
00180                 me->forward.recv( str, addr );
00181                 
00182                 pthread_mutex_lock(&me->registered_mutex);
00183                     
00184                     // Send cicle   
00185                 
00186                     for (   set<unsigned short>::const_iterator iter = me->registered.begin();
00187                         iter != me->registered.end();
00188                         iter++ ) {
00189                             dest.setPort( *iter );
00190                             me->forward.send( str, dest );
00191                     }
00192                 
00193                 pthread_mutex_unlock(&me->registered_mutex);
00194             }
00195             
00196             return NULL;
00197         }
00198 };
00199

00201 int main(int argc, const char** argv) {
00202     try {
00203         // Control for help request
00204         if ( help( argc, argv ) )
00205             return 1;
00206     
00207         // No parameters
00208         if ( argc < 2 ) {
00209             cerr<<"Need to specify port at least ( -h --help for help ), exiting\n";
00210             return 0;
00211         }
00212         
00213         int port = -1;
00214         int cport = -1;
00215         int buffer = -1;
00216         
00217         // One parameter
00218         if ( argc == 2 ) {
00219             port = atoi( argv[1] );
00220             cport = port + 1;
00221             buffer = 1500;
00222         } else if ( argc == 3 ) {
00223             port = atoi( argv[1] );
00224             cport = atoi( argv[2] );
00225             buffer = 1500;
00226         } else if ( argc == 4 ) {
00227             port = atoi( argv[1] );
00228             cport = atoi( argv[2] );
00229             buffer = atoi( argv[3] );
00230         }
00231         
00232         if ( !( port > 0 && cport > 0 && buffer > 0 &&
00233             port < 0xFFFF && port < 0xFFFF && buffer < 0xFFFF &&
00234             port != cport ) ) {
00235             cerr<<"Wrong input data\n";
00236             return 0;
00237         } else {
00238             cout<<"Opening relay on:\nport:         "<<port<<"\ncontrol port: "<<cport<<"\nbuffer:       "<<buffer<<endl;
00239             Forwarder forwarder( port, cport, buffer );
00240             forwarder.start();
00241         }
00242         return 1;
00243 
00244     } catch ( exception& exc ) {
